There is a lot of misleading information circulating about the Ministry's inspections. I want to be crystal clear- the Ministry conducted 2,800 inspections in 2019. Every single LTC home in Ontario gets inspected at least once a year 1/3 #onpoli #longtermcare #covid19on

The work continues in long-term care. We put in strong measures early on to protect seniors most vulnerable to COVID-19.   And we understand, w all measures that are taken to protect people, that they are not without cost. This is a difficult time for people w loved ones in LTC.
